snippet.title: Myst V: End of Ages - Intro
snippet.description:
One of the most tragic intros ever opens the final chapter in the Myst saga. Atrus tells of how he's lost everything and that he has past a great burden onto Yeesha.


Transcript can be found here: http://www.mystwiki.com/wiki/Atrus%27s_Letter_%28Myst_V_Opening_Speech%29
